poemsDataJson.list_full: さびしさに 宿(やど)を立(た)ち出(い)でて 眺(なが)むれば いづこも同(おな)じ 秋(あき)の夕暮(ゆふぐ)れ
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: In my loneliness//I leave my little hut.//When I look around,//Everywhere it is the same://One lone, darkening autumn eve.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Sabishisa ni|Yado o tachi idete|Nagamureba|Izuko mo onaji|Aki no yūgure
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: いつこもおなし あきのゆふくれ
poemsDataJson.author: 良暹法師(りょうぜんほうし)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: ものみなが秋の夕暮れの寂寥をたたえている感慨
